mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (id, title, content, reg_dt, upd_dt, reg_user_id, upd_user_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{regUserId}, #{updUserId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post ORDER BY reg_dt DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{article.title}, content = #{article.content}, upd_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, upd_user_id = #{article.updUserId} WHERE id = #{id};
